Primary outcome consist quality life distress . In ancillary study , compare intervention wait-list control group biomarkers stress ( hair saliva cortisol ) aging ( telomere length saliva ) . Finally , facilitate statewide dissemination Nuevo Amanecer-II ( NA-II ) , develop guide implementation community-based organization .
